## load libraries
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(wordcloud)
```
## import and view data
```{r}
df <- readr::read_csv("cleaned_data.csv")
head(df, 10)

# japanese particles
jpn_prtcl <- c(
               "no", "wa", "o", "mo", "ni", "e", "de", "ga",
               "to", "ya", "ne", "yo", "ka", "wo", "i", "yo",
               "kara", "yori", "na", "dake", "a", "te", "mo",
               "mou"
              )
```

```{r}
theme_set(theme_light())
# top 15 songs with most words
df %>%
  group_by(Song_title) %>%
  summarise(N = sum(Count)) %>%
  arrange(desc(N)) %>%
  head(15) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = reorder(Song_title, N), y = N)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_flip() 

# top 15 most used words
df %>%
  filter(!Word %in% jpn_prtcl) %>%
  group_by(Word) %>%
  summarise(N = sum(Count)) %>%
  arrange(desc(N)) %>%
  head(15) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = reorder(Word, N), y = N)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  coord_flip()

# distribution of number of words in a song
df %>%
  group_by(Song_title) %>%
  summarise(N = sum(Count)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = N)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 15)


# distribution of word counts
df %>%
  filter(!Word %in% jpn_prtcl) %>%
  group_by(Word) %>%
  summarise(N = sum(Count)) %>%
  filter(N < 200) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = N)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 2)
```

## word cloud
```{r}
# word cloud
newdf <- df %>%
  filter(!Word %in% jpn_prtcl) %>%
  group_by(Word) %>%
  summarise(N = sum(Count)) %>%
  top_n(100)


# for reproducibility
set.seed(2)

wordcloud(
  words = newdf$Word,
  freq = newdf$N,
  random.colors = TRUE,
)

```
